title: BaublToken
author: BaublToken
created_time: May 31, 2023, 08:17:19 AMLast edit: June 02, 2023, 11:57:37 AM by BaublToken
content: We're proud to introduce Baubl Token (BAUBL)               an ERC-20 token with a purpose. Enhancing the crypto ecosystem by providing better access and exploring different, but simple features. Update!! For more details see: https://www.baubl.ioTwitter: https://twitter.com/baubltokenEtherscan.io: https://etherscan.io/address/0xcbd514651067342047cd21b4e4dd07cd1152d3fbGitHub: https://github.com/baubltoken/baubl                Everyone is invited to join the BAUBL

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: BaublToken on May 31, 2023, 08:17:19 AM       https://sites.google.com/view/baubltoken/Do you even think that people will invest in a coin whose website is hosted on a free domain? I don't think that anyone is going to fall into the trap because if a coin is hosted on a free domain that's given by google then why would an investor think to invest money in such coin?If you really think that you have a legit project and you can offer good services then you should host the site on a paid domain rather than relying on a free domain name. At least with a good domain name people still give a look to a project, but not the one with a free domain name.

comments.author: BaublToken
comments.body: Thank you for the interest and very good comment. We agree with the suggestion.The relevant change / update of the project site domain name is in the process ...

comments.author: BaublToken
comments.body: Web site for B.A.U.B.L project:                 www.baubl.io
